title: WTB: T206 Gandil with Tough Backs
author: Epps

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Gandil with Tough Backs
posts.post_content: I am going after a T206 Gandil back run and am looking for the Hindu, Cycle 460, AB 460, Old Mill, and EPDG backs. Please PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] if you have anything that you would consider parting with.
PM and email sent- Trent King
